raw_comment: I do not want the higher classes to get better educations and better privileges. The lower classes also need a good education. A good country thrives on how the people are educated and how well they have done in college. College is a big and important gap within people's lives. Their whole lives are based on what college they went to and how they did throughout. I don't want people to do bad just because they are caught up on money or any of that nonsense. It doesn't cost colleges much to enroll a student into they education system!
ace_sentences: I do not want the upper classes to get better education than the lower classes.
I do not want the upper classes to get better privileges than the lower classes.
The lower classes also need good education.
A country thrives depending on how the people are educated.
A country thrives depending on how well the people have done in college.
College is a big and important gap in people's lives.
A person's whole life is based on which college the person went to.
A person's whole life is based on how the person did in college.
I do not want people to do badly because they lack money.
I think that it does not cost colleges much to enroll a student in their education system.
